mapper.select: SELECT o.goods_id, o.user_phone, o.create_time, o.state, g.goods_id "goods.goods_id", g.goods_name "goods.goods_name", g.start_time "goods.start_time", g.end_time "goods.end_time", g.create_time "goods.create_time" FROM orders o INNER JOIN goods g ON o.goods_id=g.goods_id WHERE o.goods_id=#{goodsid} AND o.user_phone=#{phone}
